alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Oconto County; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 10:32PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, southwestern Florence, southeastern Oneida and Langlade Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Headwaters Wilderness to near Crandon to 8 miles south of Parrish. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Crandon around 1040 PM CDT. North Otter Creek Natural Area around 1045 PM CDT. Veterans Memorial County Park around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Gagen, Popple River Headwaters Natural Area, Kelly Lynn Bog Natural Area, Post Lake, Kempster, Blackwell, Otter Springs Recreation Area, Ormsby, Choate and Peters Marsh Wildlife Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Northern Oconto County; Oneida
